dcterms:creator: T. Karras
M. Aittala
J. Hellsten
S. Laine
J. Lehtinen
T. Aila
dcterms:description: A dataset containing more than 7500 four-finger images and over 14,000 manually segmented single-fingertip images, along with 10,000 synthetic fingertips, collected from various Presentation Attack Instruments (PAIs) of different difficulty levels.
dcterms:title: Presentation Attack Detection (PAD) dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Kolberg
J. Priesnitz
C. Rathgeb
C. Busch
dcterms:description: A dataset for contactless fingerprint presentation attack detection research, containing 7200 samples of 72 different PAI species captured using two different smartphones.
dcterms:title: COLFISPOOF dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Priesnitz
C. Rathgeb
N. Buchmann
C. Busch
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset that generates contactless fingerprint images from contact-based fingerprints, aimed at improving the training of PAD algorithms.
dcterms:title: SynCoLFinGer

dcterms:description: A commercial smartphone-based noncontact fingerprint recognition technology that captures four-finger images automatically.
dcterms:title: Veridium TouchlessID

dcterms:creator: M. S. Murshed
R. Kline
K. Bahmani
F. Hussain
S. Schuckers
dcterms:description: A graphical user interface for manual segmentation of fingerprint images, allowing for precise labeling and extraction of fingertip regions.
dcterms:title: Clarkson graphical user interface for manual segmentation
